subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Missing 15 games in the middle of a playoff chase says something about the severity of the blow Brendan Shanahan sustained on Feb. 17. But it also says something about the sport he was jarred from.
snippet: Missing 15 games in the middle of a playoff chase says something about the severity of the blow Brendan Shanahan sustained on Feb. 17. But it also says something about the sport he was jarred from.
